General_Description: '''Bounty on Merchant Ships''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description:
Kassandra noticed a bounty for [[merchant]] boats on a [[message board]]:
#"The [[merchant]] ring has taken control of all the trade in the harbor. They're squeezing all other trade out of the city. Feed them to the [[Great white shark|sharks]]."
#"The merchant rings control the ports. Don't believe anyone who tells you otherwise. Sink the boats and don't trust anyone!"
#"The merchants are the ones who keep [[Peloponnesian War|this war]] going, selling to both sides and getting fat. Sink their ships and let them sell to the fish."
#"The merchants smuggle in goods and take [[Slavery|slaves]], they fund [[Piracy|pirates]], and they play both sides of the war to make their [[drachma]]e. Sink them all."
#"These fat, stinking merchants think they control the harbor with their drachmae. Sink a few of their precious boats, and they'll remember their place."
#"What foul bargains have these merchants made to make them so bold in our waters? If [[Poseidon]] will not take them himself, you must send them to him."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra accepted the contract, and sought out the merchant ships, sinking them and claiming the bounty.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: The bounty flavor texts are not bound to any single region or city.
